page_description: Privacy policy and personal data protection of Linguami. GDPR compliant.
title: Privacy Policy
subtitle: How we collect, use and protect your personal data
intro: At Linguami, we respect your privacy and are committed to protecting your personal data. This policy explains how we collect, use and protect your information in accordance with the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR) of the European Union.
section_1_content:
We collect the following information when you use Linguami:

**Account Information:**
- Username (nickname)
- Email address
- Profile picture (if you log in via Google, Facebook or Apple)
- Spoken language and learning language
- Language level

**Usage Data:**
- Progress in lessons and exercises
- Words added to your personal dictionary
- XP points, level and learning statistics
- Time spent on the platform

**Technical Data:**
- IP address
- Browser type and device
- Session cookies
section_2_content:
We use your data to:

- **Provide the service**: Manage your account, save your progress
- **Improve the experience**: Personalize your learning journey
- **Communicate**: Send important notifications (email validation, password reset)
- **Security**: Protect your account and prevent fraud
- **Development**: Improve our features and fix bugs

We **never sell** your personal data to third parties.
section_3_content:
If you log in via Google, Facebook or Apple:

- We only receive your **name**, **email** and **profile picture**
- We **never** access your Google/Facebook/Apple account
- You can revoke access at any time in your third-party account settings
- **Facebook only**: If you revoke access via Facebook, your data will be automatically and permanently deleted from Linguami in compliance with GDPR
- These services have their own privacy policies that we encourage you to review
section_4_content:
Your data is:

- **Encrypted** during transfer (HTTPS/SSL)
- **Stored** on secure servers (Supabase - AWS infrastructure)
- **Protected** by hashed passwords (bcrypt)
- **Backed up** regularly to prevent data loss

We retain your data as long as your account is active.
section_5_content:
In accordance with GDPR, you have the right to:

- **Access** your personal data
- **Rectify** incorrect information
- **Delete** your account and all your data
- **Export** your data (portability)
- **Object** to the processing of your data
- **Limit** the processing of your data

**How to delete your account:**
- Directly via **Settings → Delete my account**
- Or by revoking access via Facebook (automatic deletion)

**What gets permanently deleted:**
Your account, personal dictionary, lesson progress, XP statistics, exercise results, completed courses, goals and achievements. This action is immediate and irreversible.

For other rights, contact us at: **contact@linguami.com**
section_6_content:
We use cookies for:

- **Session**: Maintain your connection
- **Preferences**: Save your choices (dark/light theme, interface language)
- **Analytics**: Google Analytics to improve the site (anonymized)

You can disable cookies in your browser, but some features may no longer work.
section_7_content:
We only share your data with:

- **Supabase**: Database hosting (GDPR compliant)
- **Cloudflare**: CDN for media files (GDPR compliant)
- **Google Analytics**: Anonymized statistics

We **never** share your data with advertisers or data brokers.
section_8_content:
Linguami is accessible to users **13 years and older**.

If you are under 16 (legal age in the EU), parental or legal guardian consent is required. We do not knowingly collect data on children under 13.
section_9_content:
We may modify this privacy policy. Important changes will be notified by:

- Email to your registered address
- Notification on the platform
- Update of the "Last updated" date below

Continued use of Linguami after modification implies acceptance of the new terms.
section_10_content:
For any questions regarding this policy:

**Email:** contact@linguami.com
**Data Protection Officer:** Linguami

We are committed to responding within **30 days** in accordance with GDPR.
cta_subtitle: We are here to help and answer all your concerns
